content: HUD-1 Plastic wall plug Economical universal plastic wall plugs for light-duty fastening to hollow and solid walls ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Versatile design – suitable for use with a wide range of base materials, including concrete, solid brick, hollow brick, gas concrete, and gypsum panels, making installation simpler across different surfaces Optimized installation – anti-twist design with redesigned fins helps prevent rotation during screwdriving for a faster and safer setup, especially in hollow bricks and aerated concrete Reliable performance – engineered for a more reliable installation, Hilti plastic wall plugs help guide the screw accurately without breaking through or wandering out of the anchor body Applications Light-duty fastenings – especially electrical installations and sanitary fixtures Please note: screws are sold separately, except where clearly listed in the package content (see technical data sheet for required screw size) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Concrete (uncracked), Drywall, Masonry (hollow), Masonry (solid) Head configuration: Flat head Approvals / Test reports: N/A Technical Data | Head configuration | Flat head | Approvals / Test reports | N/A | Material, corrosion | Plastic ### ITEMS- 331618 - Univ pl anchor HUD-1 3/8 x 2 - Package Size 200 pc Package Contents: - 1x HUD-1 10X50 Univ. anchor
tag_description: Economical universal plastic wall plugs for light-duty fastening to hollow and solid walls
